basics.name: John Wick
basics.label: Senior Full-Stack Developer & Bug Exterminator
basics.summary: Legendary full-stack developer with an exceptional track record of eliminating bugs, crushing deadlines, and delivering flawless code. Known for my relentless pursuit of clean architecture and my ability to debug the most complex systems. I don't just write code - I craft digital masterpieces. Retired from the underground hacking scene, now focusing on legitimate software development. Warning: Do not touch my rubber duck debugger.

work.name: The Continental Hotel Tech Division
work.summary: Led the digital transformation of the world's most exclusive hospitality network. Developed secure, scalable systems for guest management and concierge services.
highlights: Architected a bulletproof microservices infrastructure handling 10M+ requests daily
Implemented zero-downtime deployment strategies - because downtime is not an option
Created an AI-powered concierge system that never sleeps
Reduced system vulnerabilities by 99.9% through rigorous security audits
Mentored junior developers in the art of clean code and precise execution

work.name: High Table Enterprises
work.summary: Developed mission-critical applications for a global organization with extremely high standards for precision and reliability.
highlights: Built real-time tracking systems with 99.99% accuracy
Designed encrypted communication protocols for sensitive data
Optimized database queries to execute in under 1ms - precision is everything
Implemented automated testing suites with 100% code coverage
Never missed a deadline, never shipped a bug

work.name: Freelance Consulting
work.summary: Provided specialized software solutions for clients requiring the highest level of discretion and technical excellence.
highlights: Solved 'impossible' technical challenges that other developers couldn't handle
Delivered projects with surgical precision and attention to detail
Maintained 100% client satisfaction rate
Specialized in legacy system modernization and technical debt elimination

volunteer.summary: Developing applications for animal shelters and pet adoption services. Because every dog deserves a loving home.
highlights: Built a nationwide pet adoption platform
Created mobile apps for animal rescue organizations
Donated 500+ hours of development time
Helped find homes for over 10,000 animals

awards.title: Developer of the Year
awards.summary: Recognized for exceptional technical skills and unwavering commitment to code quality.

awards.title: Bug Bounty Hall of Fame
awards.summary: Discovered and responsibly disclosed critical vulnerabilities in major platforms.

awards.title: Open Source Contributor Award
awards.summary: Outstanding contributions to open source projects and community mentorship.

publications.name: The Art of Clean Code: Precision in Programming
publications.summary: A comprehensive guide to writing maintainable, efficient code with the precision of a master craftsman.

publications.name: Bulletproof Systems: Building Unbreakable Software Architecture
publications.summary: Strategies for creating resilient, fault-tolerant systems that never fail when it matters most.

references.name: Winston (The Continental Manager)
references.reference: John is the most reliable developer I've ever worked with. When he commits to a deadline, consider it done. His code is as clean as his reputation is legendary. I would trust him with our most critical systems without hesitation.

references.name: Charon (Senior DevOps Engineer)
references.reference: Working with John is like having a guardian angel for your infrastructure. He anticipates problems before they happen and solves them with surgical precision. His attention to detail is unmatched.

references.name: The Bowery King (CTO, Underground Tech Collective)
references.reference: John Wick doesn't just write code - he crafts digital art. His solutions are elegant, efficient, and absolutely bulletproof. He's the developer you call when failure is not an option.

projects.name: Continental Guest Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive hospitality management platform with real-time booking, concierge services, and guest preferences tracking. Built with microservices architecture for maximum scalability and reliability.
highlights: Handles 50,000+ concurrent users without breaking a sweat
99.99% uptime - more reliable than a Swiss watch
Integrated AI-powered recommendation engine
Zero security breaches in production

projects.name: PetFinder Pro
projects.description: A nationwide pet adoption platform connecting shelters with potential pet parents. Features advanced matching algorithms, real-time chat, and comprehensive pet profiles.
highlights: Facilitated 10,000+ successful pet adoptions
Mobile-first responsive design
Real-time geolocation matching
Integrated payment processing for adoption fees

projects.name: SecureVault API
projects.description: Enterprise-grade encrypted data storage API with military-level security protocols. Designed for organizations requiring the highest levels of data protection.
highlights: AES-256 encryption with custom key management
Zero-knowledge architecture
SOC 2 Type II compliant
Sub-millisecond response times

projects.name: CodeReview Assassin
projects.description: An AI-powered code review tool that identifies bugs, security vulnerabilities, and performance issues with deadly accuracy. Open source project with 15k+ GitHub stars.
highlights: Detects 95% of common security vulnerabilities
Integrates with all major Git platforms
Supports 20+ programming languages
Used by 500+ development teams worldwide
